s0001: Marquis Jiang Zhou Bo was a native of Pei.
s0002: His ancestors were from Juan, migrated to Pei.
s0003: Bo made his living weaving reed mats, often played flute for people's funerals, served as a skilled crossbowman in the reserves.
s0004: When Gaozu as Duke Pei first rose up, Bo as attendant followed in attacking Hu Ling, captured Fangyu.
s0005: Fangyu rebelled, fought with them, drove them back.
s0007: Struck Qin army east of Dang.
s0008: Returned army to Liu and Xiao.
s0010: Captured Xiayi, first to ascend the walls.
s0011: Granted rank of Grandee of the Fifth Degree.
s0012: Attacked Meng and Yu, took them.
s0013: Struck Zhang Han's chariots and cavalry, brought up the rear.
s0015: Attacked Yuanqi and Dongmin, proceeding to Li, took it.
s0016: Attacked Nie Sang, first to ascend.
s0017: Struck Qin army below E, broke it.
s0018: Pursued to Puyang, captured Zhen city.
s0019: Attacked Duchuan and Dingtao, raided and took Wanju, captured Shanfu magistrate.
s0020: Night raided and took Linji, attacked Zhang, advancing first to Juan, broke it.
s0021: Struck Li You's army below Yongqiu.
s0022: Attacked Kaifeng, first to reach the city walls with the most.
s0023: Later Zhang Han defeated and killed Xiang Liang, Duke Pei and Xiang Yu led troops east to Dang.
s0024: From first rising in Pei returning to Dang, one year two months.
s0025: King Huai of Chu enfeoffed Duke Pei with the title Peaceful Martial Marquis, made him magistrate of Dang commandery.
s0026: Duke Pei appointed Bo as Commander of the Tiger Braves, as commander followed Duke Pei to pacify Wei territory.
s0027: Attacked the East Commandery Governor at Chengwu, broke him.
s0028: Struck Wang Li's army, broke it.
s0030: Attacked Yingyang and Goushi, cut off the river crossing.
s0031: Struck Zhao Ben's army north of Shi.
s0032: South attacked Nanyang Governor Yi, broke Wuguan and Yaoguan.
s0033: Broke Qin army at Lantian, reached Xianyang, extinguished Qin.
s0034: Xiang Yu arrived, made Duke Pei King of Han.
s0035: The King of Han granted Bo rank as Martial Marquis.
s0036: Followed in entering Hanzhong, appointed as general.
s0037: Returned to pacify the Three Qins, reached Qin, granted fief in Huaide.
s0038: Attacked Huaili and Haozhi, first in merit.
s0039: Struck Zhao Ben and Chamberlain Bao at Xianyang, first in merit.
s0041: Struck Zhang Ping and Yao Ang's army.
s0043: Returned and captured Mei and Fenyang.
s0044: Besieged Zhang Han at Fei Qiu.
s0046: Struck the bandit Ba army, broke it.
s0050: Attacked Qu Ni, first in merit.
